rows.Name: usiSwitch
rows.Comment:
Number of the output; Several time periods for each output
are possible. [1..32]

rows.Name: todFirstOn
rows.Comment: First time from which the switch is to be switched on

rows.Name: todLastOn
rows.Comment: Last time until which the switch is to be switched on

rows.Name: byDayFlags
rows.Comment: The day(s) in a week this switch is active
